snippet: Mrs. Bush, 88, was admitted to Houston Methodist Hospital on Monday for treatment of pneumonia and remained there Tuesday evening.
abstract: Former First Lady Barbara Bush is admitted to a hospital in Houston for treatment of pneumonia.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Bush, 88, was admitted to Houston Methodist Hospital on Monday for treatment of pneumonia and remained there Tuesday evening.

headline.main: Barbara Bush Hospitalized for Pneumonia in Texas
headline.print_headline: Barbara Bush Hospitalized for Pneumonia in Texas
